member.name: T:Leadtools.GeometryTools
member.summary: Utility helper class for common geometry functions.

member.name: M:Leadtools.GeometryTools.getBoundingRect
member.summary: Gets the rectangle that contains all the points in an array.
member.param: Source points.
member.returns: The rectangle that contains all the points in the array.

member.name: M:Leadtools.GeometryTools.getCenterPoint
member.summary: Gets the point of a rectangle.
member.param: Source rectangle.
member.returns: The center point of the rectangle.

member.name: M:Leadtools.GeometryTools.getCornerPoints
member.summary: Gets the four corner points of a rectangle.
member.param: Source rectangle.
member.returns: Array of four points that define the corners of this rectangle.

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageLoader
member.summary: Loads an HTML, SVG, or other XML element from a URL.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageLoader.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new [ImageLoader].

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageLoader.abort
member.summary: Aborts the current [ImageLoader] while guaranteeing that callbacks for [Done], [Fail], and [Always] will not be run.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageLoader.dispose
member.summary: Clears the [ImageLoader] instance.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageLoader.run
member.summary: Runs the [ImageLoader].

member.name: E:Leadtools.ImageLoader.always
member.summary: Occurs after either the [Done] or [Fail] event handlers have fired.

member.name: E:Leadtools.ImageLoader.done
member.summary: Occurs when the image has loaded successfully.

member.name: E:Leadtools.ImageLoader.fail
member.summary: Occurs when the image has failed to load.

member.name: E:Leadtools.ImageLoader.preRun
member.summary: Occurs when the [Run] method is called, sending out [ImageLoaderPreRunEventArgs].

member.name: E:Leadtools.ImageLoader.PreSend
member.summary: Occurs before an image request is made, sending out [ImageLoaderPreSendEventArgs].

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.ajaxOptions
member.summary: An [ImageLoaderAjaxOptions] object to use when loading an image via AJAX.
member.value: An [ImageLoaderAjaxOptions] instance to use when loading an image via AJAX. The default value is a new instance of [ImageLoaderAjaxOptions] with default values.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.ajaxWithCredentials
member.summary: Indicates whether to send credentials with the XMLHttpRequest for an image.
member.value: **true** if the image should send credentials with the image; **false** otherwise. The default value is [DefaultAjaxWithCredentials], which is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.canRun
member.summary: Indicates whether the [ImageLoader] instance can be run.
member.value: **true** if the [ImageLoader] is not working ([IsWorking]) and has not been aborted ([IsAborted]).

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.element
member.summary: The loaded image element, when [Run] is successful.
member.value: The loaded result of the [ImageLoader] request.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.error
member.summary: An error describing the reason for the image load failure from [Run].
member.value: An error object if the image load failed; otherwise, **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.height
member.summary: The height of the successfully loaded [Element].
member.value: The height of the loaded [Element], in pixels, if it exists when the image has loaded; otherwise, 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.imagesHolder
member.summary: The HTML Element to use for temporary image loading, when necessary.
member.value: The HTML Element to use for temporary image loading. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.imgCrossOrigin
member.summary: Indicates how to handle cross-origin image requests.
member.value: A string indicating what the `crossOrigin` attribute of the HTMLImageElement used in the request should be set to. The default value is **'anonymous'**. Any string is acceptable, but other important values include **'use-credentials'** and **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.isAborted
member.summary: Indicates that the [ImageLoader] has been aborted.
member.value: **true** if [Abort] has been called; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.isHTMLImageElement
member.summary: Indicates if [Element] exists and is an HTMLImageElement.
member.value: **true** if the result image [Element] is an HTMLImageElement; **false** otherwise.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.isWorking
member.summary: A boolean indicating whether the [ImageLoader] is trying to load an image.
member.value: [IsWorking] becomes **true** after the [PreRun] event completes without [Abort] or [Dispose] being called and without cancellation from [ImageLoaderPreRunEventArgs.Cancel].

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.processAjaxData
member.summary: A callback used to access binary data from an [ImageLoaderUrlMode.ajaxDataUrl] response.
member.value: An [ImageLoaderProcessAjaxDataCallback] callback function. The default value is a callback function that immediately sends the byte array forward.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.tag
member.summary: A reference object to distinguish ImageLoader instances.
member.value: Reference object to distinguish ImageLoader instances. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.url
member.summary: The URL to load for the image request.
member.value: The URL to load for the image. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.urlMode
member.summary: Represents the type of loading that will occur when [Run] is called.
member.value: A value of [ImageLoaderUrlMode] indicating the type of loading that will occur. The default value is [ImageLoaderUrlMode.ImageUrl].

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.width
member.summary: The width of the successfully loaded [Element].
member.value: The width of the loaded [Element], in pixels, if it exists when the image has loaded; otherwise, 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.workingImageElement
member.summary: The HTMLImageElement used in the image request.
member.value: **null** by default. Can be set to a custom HTMLImageElement to use for the image request. Otherwise, a new HTMLImageElement will be created as needed.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoader.xhr
member.summary: The XMLHttpRequest object used in the image data request.
member.value: **null** by default. Can be set to a custom XMLHttpRequest object to use for the image request. Otherwise, a new XMLHttpRequest object will be created as needed.

member.name: F:Leadtools.ImageLoader.DefaultAjaxWithCredentials
member.summary: Indicates the default for [AjaxWithCredentials].

member.name: F:Leadtools.ImageLoader.DefaultImgCrossOrigin
member.summary: Indicates the default for [ImgCrossOrigin].

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageLoaderAjaxOptions
member.summary: Provides options for use with an ImageLoader AJAX load.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageLoaderAjaxOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new ImageLoaderAjaxOptions object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoaderAjaxOptions.headers
member.summary: A dictionary of key-value headers for the XMLHttpRequest.
member.value: Dictionary of key-value headers for the XMLHttpRequest. Default value is an empty dictionary.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoaderAjaxOptions.method
member.summary: The AJAX method to use for the XMLHTTPRequest (GET or POST), case-insensitive.
member.value: **GET** or **POST**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoaderAjaxOptions.postData
member.summary: Serialized data to send with the POST request.
member.value: A string containing the serialized data.

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageLoaderPreRunEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the [ImageLoader.PreRun] event.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageLoaderPreRunEventArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new ImageLoaderPreRunEventArgs object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoaderPreRunEventArgs.cancel
member.summary: Indicates whether or not to cancel the image load of an [ImageLoader].
member.value: **true** to cancel the image request. The default is **false**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageLoaderPreSendEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the [ImageLoader.PreSend] event.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageLoaderPreSendEventArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new ImageLoaderPreSendEventArgs object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageLoaderPreSendEventArgs.cancel
member.summary: Indicates whether or not to cancel the image load of an [ImageLoader].
member.value: **true** to cancel the image request. The default is **false**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageProcessing
member.summary: Provides support for image processing on an HTML5 ImageData.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ImageProcessing.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.abort
member.summary: Abort the current image processing.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.run
member.summary: Run the current image processing.

member.name: E:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.completed
member.summary: Occurs when the command finishes running.

member.name: E:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.error
member.summary: Occurs when an error occurs when the command is running.

member.name: E:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.progress
member.summary: Occurs while the command is running to provide progress report.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.arguments
member.summary: Get the dictionary to add the arguments for the current image processing command to.
member.value: The dictionary to add the arguments for the current image processing command to.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.command
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the image processing command to run.
member.value: The name of the image processing command to run.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.imageData
member.summary: Gets or sets the source HTML5 canvas image data.
member.value: The source HTML5 canvas image data for the image processing.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.isRunning
member.summary: Gets a value that indicate whether the image processing command is currently running.
member.value: **true** if the image processing command is currently running, otherwise; **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.jsFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to JavaScript file containing the image processing functions to use.
member.value: The path to JavaScript file containing the image processing functions to use.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessing.runInMainThread
member.summary: Force running this image processing operation in the current thread.
member.value: **true** to not use a web worker and run this image processing operation in the current thread, otherwise;

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageProcessingCompletedEventArgs
member.summary: Contains data for the ImageProcessing.Completed event.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageProcessingCompletedEventArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ImageProcessingCompletedEventArgs.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageProcessingCompletedEventArgs.create
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ImageProcessingCompletedEventArgs with the specified values.
member.param: The result HTML5 canvas image data.
Dictionary that contains the extra results.
member.returns: Newly created object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessingCompletedEventArgs.imageData
member.summary: Gets the result HTML5 canvas image data.
member.value: HTML5 **ImageData** that contains the result of the current image processing function applied to the original image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessingCompletedEventArgs.results
member.summary: Gets a dictionary that contains the extra results.
member.value: A dictionary that contains the extra results (if any).

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageProcessingErrorEventArgs
member.summary: Contains data for the ImageProcessing.Error event.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageProcessingErrorEventArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ImageProcessingErrorEventArgs with default parameters.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageProcessingErrorEventArgs.create
member.summary: Creates a new instance of ImageProcessingErrorEventArgs with the specified parameters.
member.param: The error object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessingErrorEventArgs.error
member.summary: Gets the current image processing error object.
member.value: The current image processing error object.

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageProcessingProgressEventArgs
member.summary: Contains data for the ImageProcessing.Progress event.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageProcessingProgressEventArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ImageProcessingProgressEventArgs with default parameters.

member.name: M:Leadtools.ImageProcessingProgressEventArgs.create
member.summary: Creates a new instance of ImageProcessingProgressEventArgs with the specified parameters.
member.param: Current operation completion percentage (0 to 100).

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessingProgressEventArgs.cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicate whether to abort the current image processing operation.
member.value: **true** to abort the current image processing operation, otherwise; **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.ImageProcessingProgressEventArgs.percentage
member.summary: Gets the current image processing completion percentage.
member.value: The current image processing completion percentage (0 to 100).

member.name: T:Leadtools.LeadCollection
member.summary: Represents a dynamic data collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the whole list is refreshed.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new empty instance of the LeadCollection class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.add
member.summary: Adds an object to the end of the LeadCollection.
member.param: The object to be added to the end of the LeadCollection. The value can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.addRange
member.summary: Adds the array of objects to the end of the LeadCollection.
member.param: The items to add to the collection.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.clear
member.summary: Removes all items from the LeadCollection.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.clearItems
member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.contains
member.summary: Determines whether an item is in the LeadCollection.
member.param: The object to locate in the LeadCollection. The value can be **null**.
member.returns: This method determines equality using the default equality comparer of the type of values in the list.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.indexOf
member.summary: Searches for the specified object and returns the 0-based index of the first occurrence within the entire LeadCollection.
member.param: The object to locate. The value can be **null**.
member.returns: The 0-based index of the first occurrence of item within the entire LeadCollection, if found; otherwise -1.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.insert
member.summary: Inserts an item into the LeadCollection at the specified index.
member.param: The 0-based index at which item should be inserted.
The object to insert. The value can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.insertItem
member.summary: Inserts an item into the LeadCollection at the specified index.
member.param: The 0-based index at which item should be inserted.
The object to insert. The value can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.insertItemRange
member.summary: Inserts an array of items into the LeadCollection at the specified index.
member.param: The 0-based index at which items should be inserted.
An array of items to insert. Items may be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.insertRange
member.summary: Inserts an array of items into the LeadCollection at the specified index.
member.param: The 0-based index at which items should be inserted.
An array of items to insert. Items may be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.move
member.summary: Moves the item at the specified index to a new location in the collection.
member.param: The 0-based index specifying the location of the item to be moved.
The 0-based index specifying the new location of the item.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.moveItem
member.summary: Moves the item at the specified index to a new location in the collection.
member.param: The 0-based index specifying the location of the item to be moved.
The 0-based index specifying the new location of the item.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.onCollectionChanged
member.summary: Raises the CollectionChanged event with the provided arguments.
member.param: Event data.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.remove
member.summary: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the LeadCollection.
member.param: The object to remove from the LeadCollection. The value can be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.removeAt
member.summary: Removes the item at the specified index of the LeadCollection.
member.param: The 0-based index of the item to remove.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.removeItem
member.summary: Removes the item at the specified index of the collection.
member.param: The 0-based index of the item to remove.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.removeItemRange
member.summary: Removes the items at the specified index of the collection.
member.param: The 0-based index of the item to remove.
The number of items to remove.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.removeRange
member.summary: Removes the items at the specified index of the collection.
member.param: The 0-based index of the item to remove.
The number of items to remove.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.setItem
member.summary: Replaces the item at the specified index.
member.param: The 0-based index of the item to replace.
The new value of the item.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadCollection.toArray
member.summary: Gets an array of the items in this collection.
member.returns: An array of the items in this collection.

member.name: E:Leadtools.LeadCollection.collectionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when an item is added, removed, changed, moved, or the entire list is refreshed.

member.name: P:Leadtools.LeadCollection.count
member.summary: Gets the number of items contained in the LeadCollection.
member.value: The number of items contained in the LeadCollection.

member.name: P:Leadtools.LeadCollection.item
member.summary: Gets or sets the item at the specified index.
member.value: The item at the specified index.

The new LeadMatrix OffsetY coefficient.

member.name: P:Leadtools.LeadMatrix.hasInverse
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this LeadMatrix is invertible.

member.summary: Gets an identity LeadMatrix.

member.name: P:Leadtools.LeadMatrix.isIdentity
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this LeadMatrix is an identity matrix.
member.value: **true** if the LeadMatrix object is an identity matrix; otherwise,

member.name: P:Leadtools.LeadMatrix.m12

member.value: The value of the second row and second column of this LeadMatrix. The default value is 1.

member.name: T:Leadtools.LeadRectD
member.summary: Stores four numbers that represent the coordinates and size of a rectangle (X, Y, Width, and Height).

member.summary: Creates a new LeadRectD object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadRectD.clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this LeadRectD.

member.summary: Determines whether the specified point is contained within this LeadRectD.

The y-coordinate of the point to test.
member.returns: Target Platforms

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadRectD.containsPoint
member.summary: Determines whether the specified point is contained within this LeadRectD.
member.param: The point to test.
member.returns: Target Platforms

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadRectD.containsRect
member.summary: Determines if the rectangular region represented by the specified value is entirely contained within this LeadRectD.
member.param: The LeadRectD to be tested.
member.returns: This method returns **true** if the rectangular region represented by rect is entirely contained within the rectangular region represented by this LeadRectD; otherwise, it is **false**.

member.summary: Initializes a new LeadRectD object with explicit parameters.
member.param: Specifies the X coordinates of the LeadRectD.
Specifies the Y coordinates of the LeadRectD.
Specifies the width of the LeadRectD. Must be a value greater than or equal to 0.
Specifies the height of the LeadRectD. Must be a value greater than or equal to 0.
member.returns: A LeadRectD set to x, y set to y, Width set to

The y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the LeadRectD.
member.returns: The resulting LeadRectD.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadRectD.inflate

The amount to inflate this LeadRectD vertically.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadRectD.inflateRect

member.param: The rectangle to inflate.
The amount to inflate this rect horizontally.
The amount to inflate this rect vertically.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LeadRectD.intersect
member.summary: Replaces this LeadRectD with the intersection of itself and the specified LeadRectD.

member.summary: Returns a LeadRectD that represents the intersection of two rectangles.

A rectangle to intersect

member.summary: Determines if this LeadRectD intersects with a test value.

member.name: T:Leadtools.LTHelper
member.summary: Represents a helper class used by the various LEADTOOLS components to detect the current browser and operating system.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.addClass
member.summary: Adds the specified class string to the HTML or SVG element's current class list.
member.param: HTML or SVG element to add the class to.
The class string.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.base64Decode
member.summary: Decodes a Base 64 encoded string and returns the result as a byte array.
member.param: Input string containing the Base 64 encoded value.
member.returns: A byte array that contains the decoded values.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.base64DecodeToArrayBuffer
member.summary: Decodes a Base 64 encoded string and returns the result as an array buffer.
member.param: Input string containing the Base 64 encoded value.
member.returns: An array buffer that contains the decoded values.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.base64DecodeToByteArray
member.summary: Decodes a Base 64 encoded string and returns the result as a byte array.
member.param: Input string containing the Base 64 encoded value.
member.returns: A byte array that contains the decoded values.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.base64Encode
member.summary: Encodes a byte array as Base 64 and returns the result.
member.param: Input byte array
If **true**, then any line feed characters (hex values 10 followed by 13) will be removed and not encoded in the final result.
member.returns: A string that contains the resulting Base 64 encoded value.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.base64EncodeFromArrayBuffer
member.summary: Encodes an array buffer as Base 64 and returns the result.
member.param: Input array buffer
member.returns: A string that contains the resulting Base 64 encoded value.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.cancelAnimationFrame
member.summary: Cancels an animation frame, with a fallback for older browsers.
member.param: The `id` received from [RequestAnimationFrame].

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.ensureUsableCanvas
member.summary: Helper method to ensure that a canvas of a given size is usable.
member.param: Input canvas element. Must not be null.
member.returns: The value used to scale the canvas to a usable size.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.hasClass
member.summary: Checks an HTML or SVG element for the given class string.
member.param: HTML or SVG element to check.
The class string.
member.returns: Like AddClass and RemoveClass, this method also works with browsers that do not support the HTML element **classList** property.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.loadJS
member.summary: Helper method to dynamically load a JS file and add it to the script section of the current document.
member.param: Path to the JS file to load.
Function to call when the JS file has been loaded.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.log
member.summary: Logs messages to the `console` without causing errors on older browsers.
member.param: Any argument to log to the `console`.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.logError
member.summary: Logs errors to the `console` without causing errors on older browsers.
member.param: Any argument to log to the `console`.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.logWarning
member.summary: Logs warnings to the `console` without causing errors on older browsers.
member.param: Any argument to log to the `console`.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.newGuid
member.summary: Creates a new GUID.
member.returns: A new randomly generated globally unique identifier (GUID) value.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.removeClass
member.summary: Removes the specified class string from the HTML or SVG element's current class list.
member.param: HTML or SVG element to remove the class from.
The class string.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.removeJS
member.summary: Helper method to dynamically remove a JS file previously loaded from the script section of the current document.
member.param: Path to the JS file to remove.

member.name: M:Leadtools.LTHelper.requestAnimationFrame
member.summary: Requests an animation frame, with a fallback for older browsers.
member.param: The callback of type [LTRender] to run when the frame is ready.
member.returns: An `id` used for cancelling.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.browser
member.summary: Gets or sets the current browser.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.device
member.summary: Gets or sets the current device.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.licenseDirectory
member.summary: The directory path where LEADTOOLS looks for the license file (Deprecated).

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.msPointerEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports the Windows 8 style touch input.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.OS
member.summary: Gets or sets the current operating system.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.requestCustomHeaders
member.summary: An object to set custom headers to for use when requesting the LEADTOOLS license files.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsAnimationFrame
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports the HTML 5 animation frame.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsCanvas
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports HTML 5 Canvas element.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsCSSTransitions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports CSS3 Transitions, either through the normal `transition`rule or a vendor prefix such as `webkitTransition`/`webkit-transition`.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsFileReader
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports the File/FileReader API, including the File, FileReader, URL, and Blob objects.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsHTMLPointerEvents
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports the CSS rule `pointer-events` for HTML elements.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsMouse
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports mouse input.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsMultiTouch
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports multi-touch input.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsScroll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports scrollbars.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsTouch
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports touch input.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsTransform
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports HTML transformation.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsTypedArray
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports HTML typed arrays.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsWebGL
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports WebGL.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.supportsWebWorker
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current browser supports HTML 5 Web Workers.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.vendor
member.summary: Gets or sets the current browser vendor.

member.name: F:Leadtools.LTHelper.version
member.summary: Gets or sets the current browser version.

member.name: T:Leadtools.LTVersion
member.summary: Holds properties about the version of LEADTOOLS being used.

member.name: P:Leadtools.LTVersion.file
member.summary: The file version as a dot-string.
member.value: A string with version information separated by dots in the pattern `Major.Minor.Build.Revision`, like `20.0.3.11`.

member.name: P:Leadtools.LTVersion.fileBuild
member.summary: The build file version.
member.value: The "Build" file version in the pattern `Major.Minor.Build.Revision`, as a number.

member.name: P:Leadtools.LTVersion.fileMajor
member.summary: The major file version.
member.value: the "Major" file version in the pattern `Major.Minor.Build.Revision`, as a number.

member.name: P:Leadtools.LTVersion.fileMinor
member.summary: The minor file version.
member.value: the "Minor" file version in the pattern `Major.Minor.Build.Revision`, as a number.

member.name: P:Leadtools.LTVersion.fileRevision
member.summary: The revision file version.
member.value: The "Revision" file version in the pattern `Major.Minor.Build.Revision`, as a number.

member.name: T:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the [LeadCollection.CollectionChanged] event.

member.name: M:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs object.

member.name: M:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.create
member.summary: Creates a new instance of NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs with the specified action.
member.param: Action to set.
member.returns: The object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.createAdd
member.summary: Creates a new instance of NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs for an add operation.
member.param: 0-based new starting index of the item(s)
member.returns: The object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.createMove
member.summary: Creates a new instance of NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs for a move operation.
member.param: 0-based old starting index of the moved item(s)
0-based new starting index of the moved item(s)
member.returns: The object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.createRemove
member.summary: Creates a new instance of NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs for a remove operation.
member.param: 0-based index of the item being removed.
member.returns: The object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.createReplace
member.summary: Creates a new instance of NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs for a replace operation.
member.param: 0-based index of the item being replaced.
member.returns: The object this method creates.

member.name: M:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.createReset
member.summary: Creates a new instance of NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs for a reset operation.
member.returns: The object this method creates.

member.name: P:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.action
member.summary: Gets the action that caused the event.
member.value: The action that caused the event.

member.name: P:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.newItems
member.summary: Gets the list of new items involved in the change.
member.value: An array of new items or moved items that still exist in the collection.

member.name: P:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.newStartingIndex
member.summary: Gets the 0-based index at which the change occurred.
member.value: The 0-based index at which new items are added or moved items now exist.

member.name: P:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.oldItems
member.summary: Gets the list of old items involved in the change.
member.value: A list of removed items or items that were moved but still exist in the collection.

member.name: P:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.oldStartingIndex
member.summary: Gets the 0-based index at which a Move, Remove, or Replace action occurred.
member.value: The 0-based index from which old items were removed or moved.

member.name: T:Leadtools.RasterSupport
member.summary: Contains methods and properties to set the client LEADTOOLS license.

member.name: M:Leadtools.RasterSupport.isLocked
member.summary: Indicates whether support is locked for an optional feature, such as LEADTOOLS Document/Medical capabilities.
member.param: Support type
member.returns: Refer to RasterSupport for more information.

member.name: M:Leadtools.RasterSupport.setLicenseBuffer
member.summary: Sets the runtime license for LEADTOOLS from a memory buffer and unlocks support for optional features such as LEADTOOLS Imaging Pro, Document, and Medical capabilities.
member.param: Byte array containing the LEADTOOLS runtime license to set.
String containing the developer key.

member.name: M:Leadtools.RasterSupport.setLicenseText
member.summary: Sets the runtime license for LEADTOOLS from a text string and unlocks support for optional features such as LEADTOOLS Imaging Pro, Document, and Medical capabilities.
member.param: String containing the LEADTOOLS runtime license to set.
String containing the developer key.

member.name: M:Leadtools.RasterSupport.setLicenseUri
member.summary: Sets the runtime license for LEADTOOLS from a URI and unlocks support for optional features such as LEADTOOLS Imaging Pro, Document, and Medical capabilities.
member.param: The URI to the license text. If **null**, the license file is requested from the RasterSupport.licenseDirectory.
String containing the developer key. If **null**, the developer key is requested from the RasterSupport.licenseDirectory.
A callback to be run once when the license check occurs. The callback receives one parameter of type SetLicenseUriResult containing the status of the operation.

member.name: P:Leadtools.RasterSupport.kernelExpired
member.summary: Checks whether the LEADTOOLS kernel has expired.
member.value: **true** if the LEADTOOLS kernel has expired; **false**, otherwise. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.RasterSupport.kernelType
member.summary: Gets the type of the LEADTOOLS kernel.
member.value: A RasterKernelType enumeration member indicating the LEADTOOLS kernel type. The default value is evaluation.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupport.licenseDirectory
member.summary: The directory path where LEADTOOLS looks for the license file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupport.requestTimeout
member.summary: Number of milliseconds to wait while setting a license asynchronously.

member.name: T:Leadtools.SetLicenseUriResult
member.summary: Result of calling RasterSupport.setLicenseUri.

member.name: M:Leadtools.SetLicenseUriResult.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SetLicenseUriResult with the specified parameters.
member.param: License set status.
Error message if the operation was unsuccessful.

member.name: F:Leadtools.SetLicenseUriResult.message
member.summary: Error message if the operation was unsuccessful.

member.name: F:Leadtools.SetLicenseUriResult.result
member.summary: License set status.

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageLoaderProcessAjaxDataCallback
member.summary: A callback type for use with [ImageLoader.processAjaxData].
member.param: The [ImageLoader] used in the request.
The binary data for the image, as a `Uint8Array` type.
A callback function to be used to continue with the byte array after any changes have been made.

member.name: T:Leadtools.LTRender
member.summary: A generic callback type with no parameters and a `void` return type.

member.name: T:Leadtools.ImageLoaderUrlMode
member.summary: Specifies the mode by which the image or XML will be loaded.

member.name: F:Leadtools.ImageLoaderUrlMode.ImageUrl
member.summary: Set the url to the `src` attribute of the workingImageElement. This is the typical way to load an HTML Image Element.

member.name: F:Leadtools.ImageLoaderUrlMode.AjaxDataUrl
member.summary: Use an XMLHttpRequest (via xhr) to load the image or SVG as binary data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.ImageLoaderUrlMode.AjaxXml
member.summary: Use an XMLHttpRequest (via xhr) to load the image or SVG directly.

member.summary: (7)Web OS.

member.name: T:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedAction
member.summary: Describes the action that caused a CollectionChanged event.

member.name: F:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedAction.Add
member.summary: (0)One or more items were added to the collection.

member.name: F:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedAction.Remove
member.summary: (1)One or more items were removed from the collection.

member.name: F:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedAction.Replace
member.summary: (2)One or more items were replaced in the collection. In this case, the [NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.OldStartingIndex] and [NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.NewStartingIndex] will be the same.

member.name: F:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedAction.Move
member.summary: (3)One or more items were moved within the collection. In this case, the [NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.OldItems] and [NotifyLeadCollectionChangedEventArgs.NewItems] should have the same entries.

member.name: F:Leadtools.NotifyLeadCollectionChangedAction.Reset
member.summary: (4)The content of the collection changed dramatically.

member.name: T:Leadtools.RasterKernelType
member.summary: Indicates the Leadtools Kernel type.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterKernelType.Release
member.summary: Kernel is a Release build.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterKernelType.Evaluation
member.summary: Kernel is an Evaluation build, and will expire at some point in the future. Kernel will also display an evaluation message box during execution.

member.name: T:Leadtools.RasterSupportType
member.summary: Indicates the optional LEADTOOLS feature to check.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Document
member.summary: Support for LEADTOOLS Document features (ABC, ABIC, JPEG 2000, JBIG2, NITF, CMW, Document Cleanup, Annotations, JPIP and more). Also includes support for 12 bit grayscale, 16-bit grayscale, 48-bit color and 64-bit images. A LEADTOOLS Document license is required.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Barcodes1D
member.summary: Support for reading and writing Linear bar codes. This is available in the LEADTOOLS Barcode 1D Module.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Barcodes2D
member.summary: Support for reading and writing 2D bar codes. This is available in the LEADTOOLS Barcode 2D Module.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.RasterPdfRead
member.summary: Support for loading PDF, PS and EPS file formats as raster images. Available in selected LEADTOOLS products. If this support is locked, the PDF, PS and EPS files will not be loaded.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.RasterPdfSave
member.summary: Support for saving raster images as a PDF file. Available in selected LEADTOOLS products. Includes support for MRC PDF compression and JBIG2 support.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.PdfAdvanced
member.summary: Support for advanced PDF features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Jbig2
member.summary: Support for the JBIG2 file format.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.OcrLEAD
member.summary: Support for the OCR features provided by the LEADTOOLS OCR Module - LEAD Engine. OCR add-on to Document and Medical Imaging toolkits.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.OcrPlus
member.summary: (Deprecated) Support for the OCR features provided by the OCR Plus engine. OCR add-on to Document and Medical Imaging toolkits.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.OcrLEADPdfOutput
member.summary: Support for saving OCR results from the LEADTOOLS OCR Module - LEAD Engine as a PDF file. This license is in addition to the cost of the OCR Plugin or Document Imaging.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.OcrPlusPdfOutput
member.summary: (Deprecated) Support for saving OCR results from the OCR Plus engine as a PDF file. This license is in addition to the cost of the OCR Plugin or Document Imaging.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Omr
member.summary: Support for the LEADTOOLS OMR Module. This supports the recognition of check boxes. Available in selected LEADTOOLS products.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.IcrPlus
member.summary: (Deprecated) Support for the ICR Module within the OCR Plus engine. This supports the recognition of handwritten text. Available in selected LEADTOOLS products

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.DocumentWriters
member.summary: Support for LEADTOOLS Document Writer functionality.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.DocumentWritersPdf
member.summary: Support for PDF output when using the LEADTOOLS Document Writer functionality.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.PrintDriver
member.summary: Support for LEADTOOLS Virtual Printer Driver functionality.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.PrintDriverServer
member.summary: Support for LEADTOOLS Virtual Printer Driver functionality on Windows Server.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.PrintDriverNetwork
member.summary: Support for LEADTOOLS Virtual Network Printer Driver functionality.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Forms
member.summary: Support for Forms Recognition and Processing functionality. Available in selected LEADTOOLS products.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.MediaWriter
member.summary: Support for Data DVD Writing. Available in selected LEADTOOLS products.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Medical
member.summary: Support for the DICOM file format, document, and all medical features excluding DICOM Communication. Also includes support for 12 bit grayscale, 16-bit grayscale, 48-bit color and 64-bit images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Medical3d
member.summary: Support for Medical 3D features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.DicomCommunication
member.summary: Support for everything unlocked by Medical, plus support for DICOM Network Communication.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Vector
member.summary: Support for the Vector Features and Vector file formats. Available in selected LEADTOOLS products.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Cloud
member.summary: Support for LEADTOOLS Cloud SDK.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.AppStore
member.summary: Support for using LEADTOOLS in an App Store application (Windows Store, Apple Store, Android Store). A LEADTOOLS App Store license is required.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Basic
member.summary: Support for LEADTOOLS Basic features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Hl7
member.summary: Support for the Medical HL7 features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.MultimediaMediaStreaming
member.summary: Support for the Multimedia Streaming features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Multimedia
member.summary: Support for the Multimedia features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.MultimediaVideoStreaming
member.summary: Support for the Multimedia Video Streaming features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.MultimediaMpeg2Transport
member.summary: Support for the MPEG2 Transport features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Annotations
member.summary: Support for the Annotations features.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterSupportType.Svg
member.summary: Support for the SVG features.

member.name: T:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective
member.summary: Indicates the view perspective of the image data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft
member.summary: Top-left of image is first in memory.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.BottomLeft180
member.summary: Same as TopLeft, which is BottomLeft rotated clockwise by 180 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.TopRight
member.summary: First row is the right side, first column is top side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.BottomRight
member.summary: First row is the right side, first column is the bottom side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft180
member.summary: Same as BottomRight, which is TopLeft rotated clockwise by 180 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.BottomLeft
member.summary: Bottom-left of image is first in memory.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.BottomLeft90
member.summary: Same as LeftTop, which is BottomLeft rotated clockwise by 90 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.LeftTop
member.summary: First row is the left side, first column is the top side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.RightTop
member.summary: First row is the right side, first column is top side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft90
member.summary: Same as RightTop, which is TopLeft rotated clockwise by 90 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.BottomLeft270
member.summary: Same as RightBottom, which is BottomLeft rotated clockwise by 270 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.RightBottom
member.summary: First row is the right side, first column is the bottom side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.LeftBottom
member.summary: First row is the left side, first column is top side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft270
member.summary: Same as LeftBottom, which is TopLeft rotated clockwise by 270 degrees.
